line_2: And ign'rance practises what error teaches!

line_1: Such breeding as one's granam preaches,
That cants and whines, and prays and preaches,
line_2: And hates both petticoats and breeches;

line_1: You nod or laugh at what the parson preaches:
line_2: Dupes to the craft of pill-prescribing leaches:
